title: Thief
description: The Games on Demand version supports English, French, Spanish.  What’s yours is mine. Garrett, the Master Thief, steps out of the shadows into the City. In this treacherous place, his unrivalled set of skills is the only thing he can trust. As an uprising emerges, Garrett finds himself entangled in growing layers of conflict. Lead by Orion, the tyrannized citizens will do everything they can to claim back the City from the Baron’s grasp. If Garrett doesn’t get involved, the streets will run red with blood and the City will tear itself apart.

childDownloads.title: Thief - The Bank Heist
childDownloads.description: As the Master Thief, infiltrate the City’s most secure location, Stonemarket First Bank, to retrieve a coveted heirloom. To this day, the heavily guarded and treacherous place remains impregnable, but that’s about to change…  • Unlock a challenging mission that will put your thieving skills to the test. • Outsmart security measures found exclusively in this mission • Search for the Bank’s unique loot and many other secrets!

childDownloads.title: Thief - Booster Pack: Opportunist
childDownloads.description: Get access to an exclusive bundle of optional in-game consumables that can empower you and hasten your progression through THIEF.   The Opportunist Booster Pack contains the following items: o Quiver Capacity Level 3 (Increases the maximum capacity of arrows) o Choke arrows (10) o Poppy flowers (10) o Gold (750)

childDownloads.title: Thief - Gameplay Trailer
childDownloads.description: In this gameplay trailer, get your first in-game look at Garrett's hideout, the dark alleys of the City, and your old friend Basso. See all the pillars of Thief gameplay in action - Infiltration, Theft and Escape - as Garrett enters the Baron's manor, grabs the shinies and leaves without a trace.  The challenge is everything.

childDownloads.title: Thief - Booster Pack: Ghost
childDownloads.description: Get access to an exclusive bundle of optional in-game consumables that can empower you and hasten your progression through THIEF.   The Ghost Booster Pack contains the following items: o Lockpick Quality Level 3 (Massively increases lockpicking sensitivity) o Water arrows (40) o Rope arrows (20) o Gold (750)

childDownloads.title: THIEF - Garrett the Master Thief trailer
childDownloads.description: Some steal to survive, Garrett survives to steal… Get inside the mind of Garrett and understand what it takes to become the Master Thief. What's Yours Is Mine.

childDownloads.title: THIEF - Out of the Shadows trailer
childDownloads.description: Garrett the Master Thief is back with this announcement trailer for Eidos-Montreal's reinvention of the classic series. Step into the silent shoes of Garrett, a dark and solitary thief with an unrivaled set of skills. The most challenging heists, the most inaccessible loots, the best kept secrets: nothing is out of his reach.

childDownloads.title: Thief - Booster Pack: Predator
childDownloads.description: Get access to an exclusive bundle of optional in-game consumables that can empower you and hasten your progression through THIEF.   The Predator Booster Pack contains the following items: o Bow Balancing Level 3 (Massively reduces aiming time) o Sawtooth arrows (10) o Food (10) o Gold (750)

childDownloads.title: Thief - VGX Trailer
childDownloads.description: The City has changed, the balance has shifted, all because men in robes had to tamper with forces they could not fully understand.   Garrett is no saviour, but he may be forced to step into the light before the City succumbs to darkness.

childDownloads.title: Thief - "Uprising" Gamescom 2013 Trailer
childDownloads.description: Garrett the Master Thief is entangled in the growing layers of conflict between Baron Northcrest and the oppressed masses led by Orion, the voice of the people. In a City on the brink of revolution, his skills are all he can trust as he walks the fine line between politics and the people.

childDownloads.title: Thief- The Forsaken - Challenge Map:
childDownloads.description: "The Forsaken - Challenge Map:  Explore a sinister abandoned facility, steal all its darker secrets and escape what may be lurking in the shadows… Challenge your friends and rediscover areas of the game with complete new rules!  The player can play “The Forsaken Challenge Map” in 3 modes: - Chain & Gain - Special Loot Hunt - Chain & Gain Limited"
